name: Jane Rose Dinoy Ochavo
title: I’m a Frontend Developer
description: I create efficient, high-quality solutions with a detail-oriented and proactive mindset. Beyond clean code, I focus on real-world impact, collaboration, and getting things done right. Thoughtful, adaptable, and driven—I ensure every project is executed with excellence.

personalInformation.description: A detail-oriented professional passionate about problem-solving and efficiency.

educationtab.title: Education
educationtab.description: Bachelor of Science and Technology graduate with a strong foundation in programming.

schools.description: Pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree with a focus on programming. Gaining in-depth knowledge and practical experience.
Building a strong foundation in academic and technical skills.
Developing critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaborative skills.
Establishing essential learning skills and academic fundamentals.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Master the essentials of web development with Next.js, Vue.js, React, Tailwind CSS, PHP, and MySQL, building dynamic, responsive, and scalable web applications.

hover_text.title: Next.js
hover_text.description: A React framework for building fast, server-rendered and static web applications with ease.

hover_text.title: Vue.js
hover_text.description: A progressive JavaScript framework for building interactive and flexible frontend applications.

hover_text.title: React
hover_text.description: A JavaScript library for creating reusable UI components and dynamic user interfaces.

hover_text.title: Tailwind CSS
hover_text.description: A utility-first CSS framework for quickly styling modern and responsive web designs.

hover_text.title: PHP
hover_text.description: A server-side scripting language used for building dynamic websites and backend functionality.

hover_text.title: Figma
hover_text.description: A cloud-based design tool for creating UI/UX prototypes, wireframes, and collaborative design projects.

data.title: Warmows
data.description: The RR Water Refilling Sales Monitoring Web System (WARSMOWS) is an online tool that streamlines sales tracking, inventory management, expenses, POS, user accounts, deliveries, and customer data handling. With reporting, analytics, robust security, and mobile compatibility, it empowers water refilling businesses to operate efficiently and make informed decisions.

data.title: Travelog
data.description: Travelog is a travel blog website that shares inspiring destinations, travel tips, and personal experiences to help adventurers explore the world. With engaging stories, stunning visuals, and practical guides, it makes travel planning easier and more exciting.

data.title: Agile Webworks
data.description: is a dynamic web development company specializing in creating fast, scalable, and user-friendly websites using modern technologies. With an agile approach, it delivers innovative digital solutions tailored to businesses' unique needs.
